title: cmd/godoc: linkifies true literal to bogus /pkg/builtin#true
body:
cmd/godoc linkifies "true" to the /pkg/builtin#true, which isn't a valid link:

With a local godoc (at least on Linux), see:

http://localhost:6060/pkg/syscall/

Which has:

     const ImplementsGetwd = true

Where "true" is a link to:

    http://localhost:6060/pkg/builtin/#true

But only #bool has a heading.
